ModSettings.name: More Unit Levels (Scaled)
ModSettings.title: [Util] More Unit Levels (Scaled)
ModSettings.description:
NOTE: this Mod serves as a replacement and is NOT compatible with "More Unit Levels". It will need to be disabled or uninstalled.
Based off of the "Increased Unit XP" Mod by Kilgore; however, with maximum attributes increase at max level scaled to approximately 200% (in most cases) of baseline values.
For example (SCALED max increase vs UNSCALED vs baseline) - Resist (+6 vs +10 (lvl 20) vs +5 (lvl 6)) - Melee Attack (+6 vs +10 (lvl 20) vs +3 (lvl 6)) - Range Attack (ditto) - Throw Bonus (ditto) - FireBreath Bonus (ditto) - Defense (+4 vs +7 (lvl 20) vs +2 (lvl 6)) - HitPoints (+4 vs +6 (lvl 20) vs +2 (lvl 6)) - Attack Chance (+0.4 vs +0.4 (lvl 20) vs +0.3 (lvl 6)) (remains same as prevous mod)
This Mod increases the base number of levels a unit can obtain (in most cases) to 18.
However, Level 19 and 20 are obtainable with Warlord trait and/or the Crusade Spell.
ModSettings.author: DorianGray
